resources.string: Choose your destination and find out the details about documents.
Click the button below to add a destination

National Driver\'s License (CNH-e) National Identity Card (DNI) Voter\'s Title, provided he has a photo (for those who have already taken the biometrics before the Regional Electoral Court of your State). Return ticket: some countries request passage back to the place of origin or to another destination. This can happen on trips tourism, business or study. The idea is to ensure that the person does not stay in the country beyond what is necessary. Vaccination certificate: check if your destination does not require vaccinations specific for certain regional diseases. Find out more details about the requirement for vaccines for travel. Monetary proof: upon arrival in the country, it may be necessary to indicate if you have enough resources for the period of stay.
Add a destination for your next trip
